info.title: MiiSX
info.author: SLotman
info.details:
http://miisx.icongames.com.br
  This is a port of fMSX 2.7 for the Nintendo Wii. Still needing a LOT of improvements.
  Thanks to Daniel Caetano for sharing his version fMSX-SDL, for uMSX author UGuru for inspiration, and the guys who made fMSX-SDL - without their port this version wouldn't be possible.

  Visit us at http://msx.icongames.com.br
